title: Cangjie Debug Configuration
description: Configuration for debugging Cangjie programs with cjdb

request.description: The request type. Use 'launch' to start a new debug session, 'attach' to connect to a running process.

program.description: Path to the compiled Cangjie executable to debug

args.description: Command line arguments to pass to the program

env.description: Environment variables to set for the program

cangjie_home.description: Path to the Cangjie SDK installation. If not set, uses CANGJIE_HOME environment variable.

stopOnEntry.description: Stop at the entry point of the program

processId.description: Process ID to attach to (for 'attach' request type)
